trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: 提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 的同步處理內容。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not specified at the creation of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext> instance, the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>不會建立在指定<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>執行個體，目前<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>聯<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> to associate this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> with.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> to associate this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> with.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The priority used to send and post callback methods.
trans-unit.target: 用來傳送和張貼回呼方法的優先權。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> 的複本。

trans-unit.source: The copy of this synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 這個同步處理內容的複本。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至委派的物件。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 在同步處理內容中以非同步方式叫用回呼。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: 委派會放在發送器佇列優先順序的<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> 開始，將訊息的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至委派的物件。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 在同步處理內容中以同步方式叫用回呼。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: 委派會放在發送器佇列優先順序的<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the native operating system handles.
trans-unit.target: 包含原生作業系統控制代碼的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to wait for all handles; <see langword="false" /> to wait for any handle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示等候所有控制代碼，<see langword="false" /> 則表示等候任何控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 要等候的毫秒數，如果要無限期等候，則為 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1)。

trans-unit.source: Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: 等候指定陣列中的任何元素或所有元素接收信號。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
trans-unit.target: 滿足等候條件之物件的陣列索引。
